Nighty Night

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target falls @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Unconscious] and can't wake up until the end of its next turn.

Bludgeoning

Painful Poke

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.

That'll Leave a Mark!

Normal damage. Crit Effect: The target takes @Damage[2d6[bleed]].

Slashing

Devastating Strike

Triple damage. The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stunned]{Stunned 1}.
